Constructors

FontStore(IRenderer, IResourceStore<TextureUpload>, float)

Construct a font store to be added to a parent font store via AddStore(ITextureStore).

public FontStore(IRenderer renderer, IResourceStore<TextureUpload> store = null, float scaleAdjust = 100)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer

The renderer to create textures with.

store IResourceStore<TextureUpload>

The texture source.

scaleAdjust float

The raw pixel height of the font. Can be used to apply a global scale or metric to font usages.

FontStore(IRenderer, IResourceStore<TextureUpload>, float, TextureFilteringMode)

Construct a font store with a custom filtering mode to be added to a parent font store via AddStore(ITextureStore). All fonts that use the specified filter mode should be nested inside this store to make optimal use of texture atlases.

public FontStore(IRenderer renderer, IResourceStore<TextureUpload> store = null, float scaleAdjust = 100, TextureFilteringMode minFilterMode = TextureFilteringMode.Linear)

Parameters

renderer IRenderer

The renderer to create textures with.

store IResourceStore<TextureUpload>

The texture source.

scaleAdjust float

The raw pixel height of the font. Can be used to apply a global scale or metric to font usages.

minFilterMode TextureFilteringMode

The texture minification filtering mode to use.

Methods

AddStore(ITextureStore)

Adds a nested texture store to use during Texture lookup if not found in this store.

public override void AddStore(ITextureStore store)

Parameters

store ITextureStore

The store to add.

Remarks

Of note, nested stores will use their own sources and not include any sources added via AddTextureSource(IResourceStore<TextureUpload>).

AddTextureSource(IResourceStore<TextureUpload>)

Adds a texture data lookup source to load Textures with.

public override void AddTextureSource(IResourceStore<TextureUpload> store)

Parameters

store IResourceStore<TextureUpload>

The store to add.

Remarks

Lookup sources can be implemented easily using a TextureLoaderStore to provide the final TextureUpload.

Retrieves a glyph from the store.

character char
